医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新图谱提供了一种识别癌症深层机制的新方法威尔康奈尔医学和纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心的研究人员表示，对肿瘤样本中基因活性和代谢物小分子水平进行分类的图谱提供了一种识别癌症深层机制的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-atlas-offers-a-new-way-to-identify-the-deep-mechanisms-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-atlas-offers-a-new-way-to-identify-the-deep-mechanisms-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d603115-786d-4761-b33c-97c4d6352807 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 12:18:08 -0400 New atlas offers a new way to identify the deep mechanisms of cancer
不良童年经历与青少年吸食大麻问题的最高风险有关一项新的研究表明，在 0 至 12 岁之间经历过不良童年经历（包括父母滥用药物）的年轻人，在青少年时期出现青少年吸食大麻问题的风险最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Adverse-childhood-experiences-linked-to-highest-risk-for-problematic-adolescent-cannabis-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Adverse-childhood-experiences-linked-to-highest-risk-for-problematic-adolescent-cannabis-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd1667a-34ae-4d6c-8397-7a5639b9317f Thu, 29 Jun 2023 12:12:47 -0400 Adverse childhood experiences linked to highest risk for problematic adolescent cannabis use
研究人员找到了降低心脏手术患者肾损伤风险的新方法当一个人接受心脏手术时，通常会通过体外循环进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Researchers-find-new-way-to-reduce-risk-of-kidney-injury-in-cardiac-surgery-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Researchers-find-new-way-to-reduce-risk-of-kidney-injury-in-cardiac-surgery-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=730a876e-647a-4614-9ef8-0ae90b829631 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 12:07:54 -0400 Researchers find new way to reduce risk of kidney injury in cardiac surgery patients
研究显示药物测试中自动化 3D-DSRT 的前景广阔2023 年 6 月号的 SLAS Discovery 包含一篇评论文章、五篇全文文章和两篇技术简介，涵盖球体模型、用于治疗阿尔茨海默病的 3D 细胞高通量筛选 (HTS) 应用和其他药物发现研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-shows-promising-prospects-for-automating-3D-DSRT-in-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-shows-promising-prospects-for-automating-3D-DSRT-in-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a875663a-c6e4-47fc-9464-2208d45e2784 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:59:42 -0400 Study shows promising prospects for automating 3D-DSRT in drug testing
患有精神疾病的人不太可能参加癌症筛查计划奥尔胡斯大学的一项新研究表明，太多有心理障碍的人不接受结直肠癌筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/People-with-mental-illness-less-likely-to-participate-in-cancer-screening-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/People-with-mental-illness-less-likely-to-participate-in-cancer-screening-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb0a9759-6444-4ce9-ae6d-55f1ac24245b Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:53:52 -0400 People with mental illness less likely to participate in cancer screening programs
人工智能可能是更锋利、更精确的 DNA 剪刀技术的关键人工智能可能是更精确、更有效的基因治疗的关键。奥尔胡斯大学的一项新研究发现，应用人工智能预测蛋白质结构可以增强 DNA 剪刀技术 CRISPR，使患者 DNA 的切割更加精确。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/AI-may-hold-the-key-to-a-sharper-and-more-precise-DNA-scissor-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/AI-may-hold-the-key-to-a-sharper-and-more-precise-DNA-scissor-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d493f01e-860c-4e6b-a2e2-132909d0f756 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:46:14 -0400 AI may hold the key to a sharper and more precise DNA scissor technology
研究分析了西班牙女性的月经知识和月经经历瓦伦西亚理工大学 (UPV) 和高等科学研究委员会 (CSIC) 的一个团队进行的一项研究显示，超过一半的受访女性声称不知道如何管理初潮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-analyzes-menstrual-literacy-and-experiences-of-menstruation-among-Spanish-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-analyzes-menstrual-literacy-and-experiences-of-menstruation-among-Spanish-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69dfd1e0-6d87-4c27-b53f-6cc8745d893d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:32:46 -0400 Study analyzes menstrual literacy and experiences of menstruation among Spanish women
MDXX药物：一种有前途的自闭症谱系障碍新疗法同行评审期刊《迷幻医学》上的一篇新评论描述了亚甲二氧基安非他明类似物（MDXX 药物）的复杂药理学，以及它们如何帮助治疗自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/MDXX-drugs-A-promising-new-therapy-for-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/MDXX-drugs-A-promising-new-therapy-for-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f1b3dff-946a-4946-9f8d-f7eab3d24ec8 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:26:26 -0400 MDXX drugs: A promising new therapy for autism spectrum disorder
eTRANSAFE：共享药品安全数据的欧洲项目eTRANSAFE 是欧洲共享药品安全数据的项目，现已取得成果。在一个平台上，该项目集成了来自参考制药公司的 10,000 多项药理学研究的数据，以及来自收集临床和临床前研究的公共和私人信息的十几个数据库的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/eTRANSAFE-European-project-to-share-data-on-the-safety-of-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/eTRANSAFE-European-project-to-share-data-on-the-safety-of-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4013dfe-8eb2-471a-9962-cb65f117e09a Thu, 29 Jun 2023 11:10:57 -0400 eTRANSAFE: European project to share data on the safety of medicines
机器人手术领域的著名创新者被任命为纽约大学朗格尼分校耳鼻喉头颈外科系新任系主任Umamaheswar Duvvuri 医学博士、哲学博士是先进头颈微创机器人手术领域的著名研究员和创新者，被任命为纽约大学门迪克基金会耳鼻喉科教授兼耳鼻喉头颈外科系新任系主任格罗斯曼医学院，7 月 1 日生效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Renowned-innovator-in-robotic-surgery-named-as-new-chair-of-the-Department-of-Otolaryngologye28094Head-and-Neck-Surgery- at-NYU-Langone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Renowned-innovator-in-robotic-surgery-named-as-new-chair-of-the-Department-of-Otolaryngologye28094Head-and-Neck-Surgery- at-NYU-Langone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00cc72fd-ee07-4fde-854a-10f2a0351529 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 10:19:26 -0400 Renowned innovator in robotic surgery named as new chair of the Department of Otolaryngology—Head and Neck Surgery at NYU Langone
